summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4373 for the improvement of 11th Avenue South, from Lucile Street to Bennett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 51770, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
